name: es6module
description: A starting point to create ES6 module for browser

scripts.build-min: npm run build ; google-closure-compiler-js dist/es6module.umd.js >> dist/es6module.umd.min.js
scripts.doc: documentation build src/main.js -o ./doc/ -f html; documentation build src/** -f md > documentation.md
scripts.all: npm run build; npm run build-min; npm run doc
scripts.update: npm i -g npm-check-updates; ncu -u; npm install

author: Jonathan Lurie
